pkgmetadata.longdescription: Optimal Stratification in Stratified Sampling Optimization Algorithm // An Optimization Algorithm Applied to stratification Problem. It is aims to delimit the population strata and defining the allocation of sample,considering the following objective: minimize the sample size given a fixed precision level. Exhaustive enumeration method is applied in small problems, while in problems with greater complexity the algorithm is based on metaheuristic Variable Neighborhood Decomposition Search with Path Relink.
